p: The limit of detection and quantitation can be determined by the methods of [ 22]. LOD = 3.3 σ/s and LOQ = 10 σ/s. The detection and quantitation limits of liquiritin were 0.023 mg/mL and 0.070 mg/mL, the detection and quantitation limits of liquiritigenin were 0.022 mg/mL and 0.068 mg/mL, and the detection and quantitation limits of isoliquiritin were 0.003 mg/mL and 0.010 mg/mL, respectively.
